channel.title: New local problems on FixMyStreet
channel.description: The latest local problems reported by users

item.title: More fly tipping, 25th July
item.description:
Corner of Hill View Drive and Shepherds Lane. Isn't it about time you installed a CCTV camera?

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 56, Hill View Drive, Thamesmead, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Fly tipping next to the bin shed, 25th July
item.description:
This rubbish has been there for months and the refuse operatives will always collect everything else that has been dumped there but for some reason this item is always left. It's on the Neckinger Estate at the bin shed at the junction of Neckinger and Abbey Street

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Abbey Street, Old Kent Road, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Rubbish, 25th July
item.description:
Rubbish bins that are overflowing on bin day so bags are left to the side and the bin men don't take (read online that they won't take bags left to the side incase they break) that's all well and good but then the bags are left, foxes break them open and the area I live in turns into a rubbish heap, there are a couple of houses that allow their rubbish to overflow and don't bother picking up the bags or putting back in their bins for the next time. It's not the nicest thing to walk out to on the way to work.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Jim Bradley Close, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Continuous Tipping of rubbish, 25th July
item.description:
